channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Intune iOS/iPadOS Management In a Nutshell
item.description:
Hi, Jonas here! Or as we say in the north of Germany: "Moin Moin!" I’m a Microsoft Cloud Solution Architect and this blog post should give a brief overview of how to manage iOS and iPadOS devices with Microsoft Intune and how to get started. If you are planning to migrate to Intune, I highly recommend the following link to a migration guide some colleagues wrote: https://aka.ms/intunemigrationguide
Device Enrollment Enrollment is the process of registering a device with Intune and applying the necessary policies and settings to manage it. There are different methods of enrolling iOS a...
